Name: Rhubarb & Custard Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: As sharp, sweet, creamy and flavoursome as the dessert it imitates.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly. The great British dessert of rhubarb and custard inspired a cult children's TV cartoon in the 1970s featuring a naughty pink cat called Custard and a green dog named Rhubarb. Like many British men, Rhubarb spent a lot of time in his garden shed.
